title: PREVIEW The Woodchipper Murder // Bonus Ep 11
description:
**PREVIEW OF OUR LATEST BONUS EPISODE**
Please note, this is just the first half of our latest Patreon bonus episode to show what they're like. All our regular content is free, so we have a Patreon to give listeners the option to subscribe $5/month to help the show.
Full episode: https://www.patreon.com/goingwestpodcast

In 1986, a Danish Pan Am flight attendant went missing from her Connecticut home after a big snowstorm knocked out the town's power. She was in the middle of a divorce with her husband who told her friends that she was visiting her sick mother back in Denmark and that he didn't know when she'd be back. But as weeks passed and she'd missed multiple flights for work and hadn't returned any of her friends calls, they began to fear for the worse. When police finally began investigating her disappearance, they discovered that just before she was last seen, her husband had made some strange purchases. This is the murder of Helle Crafts. Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands Privacy & Opt-Out: https://redcircle.com/privacy
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
